text: The 1992 ABC Under-18 Championship was the twelfth edition of the Asian Championship for Junior Men. The tournament took place in Beijing, China from 25 September to 2 October 1992. successfully regained the title by thrashing in the championship match, 93-80, for their fourth overall championship. Meanwhile, the , subdued the defending champions , 103-74, in the battle for third place. ==Preliminary round== All times are in Chinese Standard Time (UTC+08:00) ===Group A=== {| class=wikitable
